Introduction

MERIT was a South Korean girl group under June Entertainment who had 5 members: Rikyung, Jisoo, DoA, Jihyun, and Sunhye. They debuted on November 11, 2016 with the single "Rulu Rala", and silently disbanded in 2017. All the members were High School students in their second and third years. Sara left the group sometime after they debuted, and Jisoo replaced her.
